Room.Name: Goblin Officer Quarters
Room.ShortDescription: You have foolishly wondered into the goblin officer's quarters. Two large goblins greet you with big grins.
Room.LongDescription: The officer's quarter appears to be orderly. Cots line the northern and southern walls, and two wooden tables are against the eastern wall. A heavy curtain running the width of the room can be drawn to separate the sleeping quarters from the tables. Next to some of the wooden cots you notice there are piles of armor, probably government issue. The smell of foul ale is in the air.
